name: Alpha - Cat Business
description: You are Shima, an employee at a business called Shinoda Electronics. For one reason or another, one day after talking to a cat on the street you end up turning into a cat in the middle of the day … at the workplace . Not knowing what to do, you resort to your workmates which aren’t really helpful and wind up talking to other cats on the street to find out you were not the only. It's all the work of Cat Planet or... a Raven. Seeking explanations? Play the game !
